text: You have an appointment to see Lord Vetinari in half an hour's quiet reflection in her own room, as soon as it was installed. #Thud

passages.fragment: You have an appointment to see Lord Vetinari in half an hour
passages.full_quote: <used>You have an appointment to see Lord Vetinari in half an hour</used>.

passages.fragment: in half an hour 's quiet reflection in her own room ,
passages.full_quote: David McClean is coming back <used>in half an hour's quiet reflection in her own room, h</used>er mother followed her

passages.fragment: in her own room , as soon as
passages.full_quote: I was afraid for a moment, and then, sick of this folly, took refuge <used>in her own room, as soon as</used> he comes

And that is why Tiffany looked up and saw, high above her, that little patch of blue which a prisoner calls the sky, but which she<used>, as soon as it was</used> dark enough, intended to call the exit

passages.fragment: as soon as it was installed
passages.full_quote: Or <used>as soon as it was installed</used>
